project.title: Game development with Unity and C# with Visual Studio Code

description.p1: Writing Scripts in C# for enemies, and avatar movement.
description.p2: Designing levels with ProGrid in Unity, and Unity interface.

description.p1: Created a website in React.js using React Router to navigate pages.
description.p2: Designed pages using React.js and CSS3 for styling of the page, used CSS3 to make pages mobile.
description.p3: Animated icons in React.js and CSS.
description.p4: Built Resume on website with JSON, React.js and CSS3 for design with SVGs for artwork.
description.p5: AWS Lambda call for requests to be contacted by user and react.js form with post made to Lambda call.

description.p1: Created simple HTML interface for frontend using Flask and Python backend for Rest API to make calls to MongoDB.

project.title: Game development with XNA and C# with Visual Studio

description.p1: Participated in a group of six to rapidly design and implement an RPG in three weeks.
description.p2: Created the game art and sprite movements using a combination of canvas drawing and Photoshop.
description.p3: Designed and implemented game menu navigation.
description.p4: Completed almost fully functional game; difficulty wasn't balanced and more enemy content was required. Received an A.

project.title: Creation of a media library GUI with C#

description.p1: Collaborated within a group consisting of two additional members for a User Interface class to design and code a media library GUI.
description.p2: Developed using WinForm controls using both graphical (Visual Studio) and programmatic methods.
description.p3: Combined contents from multiple directories into aggregate front end view.
description.p4: End result was a usable media library GUI for content aggregation. Received an A.
